channel.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
channel.description:
Hey! We have an update that we're ready to beta test in case you want to give it a try. Always a good idea to backup your projects and samples before installing in case something goes wrong.
https://testflight.apple.com/join/sn4U8nQQ
Here's what's new:
- Save and recall instrument templates with settings and loops - Sample instrument lets you load a sample and program melodies - Restructured and simplified browsing - Search option in sound browser - Fine tune option for any instrument - Updated limiter setting to remove clipping - Fixed audio glitches on iPhone 12
For launch, we will also bump the number of instruments to 24. Plus we have some more stuff that we might be able to include as well.
Looking forward to hear your thoughts!

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
6.6 Beta with Undo Auxy Feedback
Just sent out a new beta to everyone who helped testing the previous version. The big news is that now you can (finally) undo any changes in the loop editor! Also in this version: Old renders are automatically grouped and can be quickly deleted if you need to free up space on your device New scenes are made empty by default (use duplicate if you want to copy an existing scene) The last scene now stays selected when you play the track to the end A few tweaks for improved graphi…

Read full topic

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
What's New in Auxy 6.5 Official Announcements
We are excited to release a new version today! With Auxy 6.5 you can: Turn any sample into a melody with the melodic sampler (create a new instrument, choose “drums and samples” and look for “melodic sampler” at the very bottom of the list) Save sounds and kits as templates that you can recall quickly in any project Search for sounds in the reorganized browser Adjust the master gain for projects in the project settings Fine tune any instrument (tap the ⏣ icon in the tweak pane…

Thanks everyone for helping out with beta testing! Make sure you update to the App Store version.

Read full topic
item.source: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’ll be honest, the only difference I (think I) notice is that the rendered sample seems faster? I still have the project so here’s a fresh export https://app.auxy.co/projects/yoq3nWOI2AQKifKuPFDJ5A==

Beats me though lol… I hear the sleigh bell sound in both, maybe it’s a bit higher pitched in the rendered one? But anywho, I’m not too fussed.

OH I will say though, in the project I only used yeah TC is right, the samples are changed the sleigh bell is a shaker where it looks like that channel has a hat now. In the original project I only used 8 samples and the kit has 16 (which, whatever all good kind of a waste to only use 8 I guess lol).

Anyway, I’m still not too fussed. But it’s true they don’t match.

Read full topic

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: TC64
item.description:
Making a song with -12 gain (as a method to decrease the limiter) means the song will be very quiet, so I have to turn the iPhone volume up to hear what I’m making. Then, I play an instrument preview, and it’s too loud for my ears because the preview is playing at the “normal” volume, which is now extremely loud since I turned up my iPhone volume. I’m suggesting that the previews should also match the gain amount, so when I have a negative gain, the previews will also become quieter.

Read full topic
item.source: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates

Also, the Utopia kit preview is amazing❤️

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
New build (852) posted. This is the first release candidate that we hope to submit to the App Store unless we find any issues. It lets you add up to 24 instruments in a project, but note that if you create projects in this version, you will not be able to open them in previous versions.

item.source: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates

item.title: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
New build (851) posted with the following tweaks:

  • Loading indicators for kits will now stop spinning when the kits are downloaded
  • Now saving the correct master gain value
  • Numbers are added when saving templates with the same name
  • A bunch of small design tweaks

Note that we have replaced the button below the project list with a link to a temporary page that lists a bunch of downloadable projects. The idea is to have a place where you can easily find projects to download that can contain track ideas, loops and/or nice sounds and kits. Would be great to get your feedback on this page. Perhaps we should create a forum section where we can arrange a few threads where people can post this sort of content, instead of a static page.

We have gotten a few submissions for kit previews, but we still want some more options to spice things up for these kits:

  • 808 Saturated
  • 808 Distorted
  • 909 Clean
  • 909 Color
  • 909 Lo
  • CR78
  • Organics
  • Utopia

Read full topic
item.source: Open Beta - Melodic Sampler, QOL updates
